titles.title: An original resolution authorizing expenditures by the Select Committee on Intelligence.

calendar.text: Committee on Intelligence ordered to be reported an original measure.

action.text: Committee on Intelligence. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Boren. Without written report.
Referred to the Committee on Rules.
Committee on Rules. Ordered favorably reported an original resolution (S.Res. 381) in lieu of this measure.

bill.summary: 1/27/1988--Introduced. Authorizes the Senate Select Committee on Intelligence, from March 1, 1988, through February 28, 1989, to: (1) make expenditures from the contingent fund; (2) employ personnel; and (3) utilize, on a reimbursable basis, the services of department or agency personnel.
